Tiefling Tips & Notes

Charisma is your spellcasting ability for the various subrace spells. During Early Access, the Tiefling race used to feature +2 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ??
